root.name: OverBlood
root.description: OverviewOverblood is a survival horror for the PlayStation that focuses on a man called Raz Karcy. Raz stumbles out of a cryostasis pod to find himself in a solitary environment, wondering what happened to him.GameplayOverblood focuses on Raz and his band of misfits that he meets over the course of the game. The different characters that Raz meets have special abilities that are used to help solve puzzles. For example, the first character players meet is a tiny robot with an extension arm. He has the ability to access technology and get into cramped places. Using these different characters and the items that can be found over the course of the game allow players to complete puzzles and find out what is really going on.StoryOverblood is a game that follows Raz Karcy as he stumbles through the tight corridors of a mysterious building, trying to find out the sketchy past behind the madness the went on in the laboratory.
